discovery_rule.name: 端口发现
discovery_rule.description:
You may also consider using IF-MIB::ifType or IF-MIB::ifAlias for discovery depending on your filtering needs.
{$CLOUD_SNMP_COMMUNITY} is a global macro.

item_prototype.name: 端口:{#IFDESCR}({#IFALIAS})状态
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the interface.

trigger_prototype.name: {#IFDESCR} 端口状态异常
trigger_prototype.description: 因2019年10月1日二长7楼163方向防火墙出现状态7的告警，特增加此触发器
